flavorText:
The wurm's weave
—Elvish expression meaning "plowed fields"

foreignData.name: Erntewurm
foreignData.text: Bringe eine Standardlandkarte aus Deinem Friedhof zurück auf Deine Hand, wenn der Erntewurm ins Spiel kommt, oder begrabe den Erntwurm.

name: Harvest Wurm
originalText: When Harvest Wurm comes into play, return any basic land card from your graveyard to your hand or bury Harvest Wurm.

rulings.text: When the ability resolves, you choose whether to sacrifice the creature or perform the other action. If you can’t perform the other action, then you must sacrifice the creature.
If the creature is no longer on the battlefield when the ability resolves, you may still perform the action if you want.

text: When Harvest Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.
